history.text: HHi
Hi! What movie will we be discussing today?
Social Network, you seen it ?
I have not! Do you know what it's about?
ABout the rise of Facebook
Sounds interesting... do you know how the critics rated it?
It was movie of the year in 2010
Very interesting! Movie of the year is a very prestigious award!
I donbt want to give spoilers but there are some characters that were very cheated
But if you are a big company like facebook you are also very ruthless
I understand and that is very true! Do you know what actor played the main character?
Jesse Eisenberg played Mark Zuck very well
He's a great actor! I bet he did nail the part!
Facebook all started because Mark was dumped by his gf, thats what i learnt from the film
did you know that ?
Really? I was not aware of that! Is there anything else the film reveals?
That some people are just not made out for the tech industry it can take a toll on friendships
I bet it can. That's sad but it's the reality. I'm glad the film showcases that.
Do you know who directed the movie?
You should put it on your watchlist
Definitely. It sounds very interesting!
What else can you tell me about it?
It has gotten a 96% ratings on rotten tomato
They're a very trustworthy source. 96 is very rare for movies. If they say it's that good, then it is!
metacritic gave it a 95 out of 100
That is unbelievable! It has to be a great film as both rotten tomatoes and metacritic are hard on movies!
my favorite scene is when the twins sued Zuck, it was unexpected . If they had stayed on they would have been billionaires ten time over
You know they have to regret that move as well. Huge mistake on their part!
they did try to come up with their own platform but of course it failed
That is sad and something else I wasn't aware of. It sounds like the movie really is fact based!
this all started in 2003 , ti wasnt even that long ago
nice talking to you
I didn't know it started in 2003! Very informative!
It was great talking to you about Social Network as well! Have a great day!

uid1response.feedback: I didn't select "the document is understandable" because I didn't get the document. The other user was very responsive and really had me convinced! I would definitely watch the movie after our discussion. Thanks! I enjoyed it!
